EmailTemplate.description: Notification to NCM that an appointment has not been covered.
EmailTemplate.name: MD Coverage Unsuccessful
EmailTemplate.subject: MD Coverage Request Unsuccessful - {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Employee_Case_Trakker__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.OwnerFirstName},
We were unable to coordinate coverage for the posted appointment for {!Case.Employee__c}.
MD:
Please follow up telephonically to obtain current medical status and treatment plan.
Thank you.
{!User.FirstName}
